alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Franklin; Jackson; Jefferson; Lyon; Osage; Shawnee; Wabaunsee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 12:56AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Franklin, southwestern Jefferson, Shawnee, western Douglas, southeastern Wabaunsee, Osage, southwestern Jackson and northeastern Lyon Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1256 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles south of Delia to Topeka to near Lebo. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Topeka, southwestern Lawrence, Osage City, Carbondale, Rossville, Tecumseh, Richland, Dover, Silver Lake, Auburn, Overbrook, Lyndon, Centropolis, Burlingame, Perry, Pomona, Meriden, Scranton, Lecompton and Clinton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 169 and 178. Interstate 70 between mile markers 344 and 355. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 146 and 198. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Douglas; Franklin; Jackson; Jefferson; Lyon; Osage; Shawnee; Wabaunsee
